welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Willich, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to soak in its unique charm and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Dedicated to serving Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: No registration required. Limited to 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
